summary: Ecosystem refers to the interconnected network of living organisms and their physical environment, functioning as a cohesive unit. In technology and business contexts, it often describes the complex system of interdependent companies, products, and services that work together to create value. This concept emphasizes the importance of understanding relationships, interactions, and dependencies within a given environment, whether natural or artificial. Exploring ecosystem dynamics can provide insights into sustainability, innovation, and adaptation across various fields.
excerpt: Ecosystem: A network of interconnected elements functioning as a unified system. In nature, it encompasses living organisms and their environment. In business and tech, it represents interdependent entities collaborating to create value.
